name: Far Rockaway Skatepark
description: Beachfront skatepark steps from the Atlantic Ocean. Chill vibes with a good mix of features for all levels.
history: Part of the Rockaway Beach revitalization. A welcome addition to the surf-and-skate culture of the peninsula.
bestTimes: Summer mornings — skate then surf. Off-season is empty and perfect.
transitDirections: A train to Far Rockaway-Mott Ave, walk south to the beach.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include mini ramp, fun box, rails, manual pad, quarter pipe. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Queens skate scene in Far Rockaway. Part of the Rockaway Beach revitalization. A welcome addition to the surf-and-skate culture of the peninsula.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: A train to Far Rockaway-Mott Ave, walk south to the beach.. Summer mornings — skate then surf. Off-season is empty and perfect.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark — standard park etiquette applies.
